metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42199 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in swftools through 20201222. A heap bufferoverflow exists in the function swf_FontExtract_DefineTextCallback()located in swftext.c. It allows an attacker to cause code execution.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
